body:
The output of `spack list` should be sent to a pager if it doesn't fit on the screen.

### Rationale

The `spack list` command can produce much more output than what fits on a screen and it is inconvenient to scroll up for 20 secs. to search what you're looking for. It would be much better if  the output is sent to a pager when long enough.

### Description

Compute in some way if the output fits in the current screen, send the output to a pager if not. We might add a feature similar to [echo_via_pager](https://click.palletsprojects.com/en/7.x/api/#click.echo_via_pager) in `llnl.util.tty`.


### Additional information

We can consider using the same feature for other commands like `spack find`, `spack spec` or similar.
title: Send output of spack list to a pager
